titleStmt.title: To Dauid Dicars when quod T. Camel.
titleStmt.author: Camel, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Jmprinted at London by Hary Sutton, dwellyng in Poules Churchyarde, at the signe of the blacke boye,

notesStmt.note: Printed in single column flanked by ornamental borders.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.

place.placeName: Poules Churchyarde, at the signe of the blacke boye
